thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Modern and well located
thread.title_full: Modern and well located - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Patricia V
title: Modern and well located
text:
Just what I was looking for...a well located hotel, close good shopping, museums, nice restaurants and still quiet and relaxing. Having the Bryant Park just in front of the door makes the place special as it is always an invitation for a shot walk, grabbing some coffee or waffles in one of the charming spots within the park...or just sitting there to relax.
Inside the hotel, modern look, rooms quite spacious and clean look. The biggest bathroom I manage to see in a NY hotel...impressive.
As opportunities to improve, I would recommend a revamp of the elevators...a bit too dark. Music inside elevators and in the hall could be tuned down, specially in the morning when not necessarily guests are in a party mood.
